name: KITSUNE (Xenofage)
description:
Fighting in a galactic war to eradicate the Vermine. You find yourself abandoned on the battlefield by your superiors. Finding yourself alone and with no one to help you. You grab whatever ammunition you find and your gun to find your way off the planet or kill as many as you can before dying. Make your last stand.

Controls:

WASD : move

Left click : fire

1-4 keys : change weapon

Space : Jump

E : Interact

Shift : Crouch

Credits: 

Music:
